description: This Dart source file defines the routing infrastructure for a Flutter application, including route constants, a Router configuration, delegate, parser, and placeholder screens.

classes.name: AppRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages the navigation stack for the Flutter TV app, implementing route building and path management.

classes.name: AppRouteInformationParser
classes.description: Parses route information from string or URI and restores route information to match the current navigation state.

classes.name: AppNavigator
classes.description: Provides a simple API to navigate programmatically without BuildContext, suitable for cross-async navigation.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the details page, displays passed arguments.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the settings page.

methods.name: buildRouter
methods.description: Constructs and returns a RouterConfig object configured with the delegate and parser.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Updates internal path state based on route configuration.

methods.name: _setPath
methods.description: Sets the current route path and optional arguments, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: parseRouteInformation
methods.description: Parses the RouteInformation to extract the route path or URI.

methods.name: restoreRouteInformation
methods.description: Restores RouteInformation from the current route configuration.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Programmatic navigation method to change routes.
